errors.format: Enter the claimant’s full name without {{-invalid}}.

errors.presence: Enter the claimant’s National Insurance number.
errors.format: Enter the claimant’s National Insurance number - for example, ‘QQ123456A’.
errors.ninoMatchPartner: The claimant’s National Insurance number must not be the same as the deceased’s.

errors.format: Enter the deceased’s full name without {{-invalid}}.

errors.presence: Enter the deceased’s National Insurance number.
errors.format: Enter the deceased’s National Insurance number - for example, ‘QQ123456A’.
errors.ninoMatchClaimant: The deceased’s National Insurance number must not be the same as the claimant’s.

errors.presence: Enter the deceased’s date of death.
errors.format: Enter a valid date of death - for example, 16 08 1975.
errors.future: You cannot enter a future date of death.
errors.eligibility: The date of death must be on or after 6 April 2017.
errors.afterDateOfClaim: The date of death must be before the date of claim.
errors.beforeDateOfBirth: The date of death must be after the date of birth.

errors.presence: Enter the claimant’s date of birth.
errors.format: Enter a valid date of birth - for example, 16 08 1975.
errors.future: You cannot enter a future date of birth.
errors.afterDateOfClaim: The date of birth must be before the date of claim.
errors.afterDateOfDeath: The date of birth must be before the date of death.

sex.hint: Needed to calculate State Pension age

errors.format: Enter a valid date of claim - for example, 16 11 2016.
errors.future: You cannot enter a future date of claim.
errors.eligibility: The date of claim must be on or after 6 April 2017.
errors.beforeDateOfBirth: The date of claim must be after the date of birth.
errors.beforeDateOfDeath: The date of claim must be after the date of death.
